page.title: 06 MORETON SCHOOL
page.content: {Moreton School}was opened by{Lady {Rodney}in 1855. At that time there were 15 children! They all had to fit into 1 classroom. In 1873 an enlargement was made.On July 24th 1968 it was closed down, there were 55 pupils at the time. Eight went to their new secondary schools, the rest, who were younger, went to{Luston {C.P.School.}Most of the children's parents worked on the{Berrington {Estate.}The keys of the school went back to{Berrington Hall.}The{height}of the school building, which you can still see, is 15 feet, the{length}is 37 feet and the{width}is 18 feet.
